sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ActionableContentFilter</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>ActionableContentFilter</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ActionableContentFilter = Class.create();
ActionableContentFilter.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

	getEncodedFilter: function(current) {
		var encodedFilter = 'sys_class_name!=sys_notification_actionable_prompt^active=true^notification=' + current.notification;
		var vaProActive = GlidePluginManager.isActive('com.glide.cs.chatbot');
		if(!vaProActive) {
			 encodedFilter = encodedFilter + "^sys_class_name!=sys_notification_va_content^sys_class_name!=sys_notification_va_content_messaging^EQ";
		}
		return encodedFilter;
	},

    type: 'ActionableContentFilter'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-03-22 02:43:22</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>9c8b7069c303201032dd09c77d40dd76</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ActionableContentFilter</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Notification Providers" source="com.glide.notification.provider">e5887ca03cf1311068bcf327dfe37f57</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>protected</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_9c8b7069c303201032dd09c77d40dd76</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-03-22 19:16:27</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
